trans-unit.resname: G08·1 | Orim's Chant | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Target player can't cast spells this turn. If this spell was kicked, creatures can't attack this turn.
trans-unit.target: Target player can't cast spells this turn. If this spell was kicked, creatures can't attack this turn.

trans-unit.resname: G08·2 | Mind's Desire | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Shuffle your library. Then exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: Shuffle your library. Then exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card without paying its mana cost.

trans-unit.target: Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

trans-unit.target: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.

trans-unit.resname: G08·4 | Goblin Piledriver | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.target: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Goblin.
